Articles.Content: To the developers it would be awsome if you guys made A planet like kerbin just the opposite like Mars from Earth where the (mars like planet) has a atmosphere where you could use parachutes instead of using a lander and haves weather on the planet(s). There are endless possiblities for furture kerbal space program. Cant wait for next update (0.17) good job guys.

Allow me to link you to a few places.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/forumdisplay.php/41-Suggestions

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/15728-UNOFFICIAL-FANMADE-0-17-Discussion-thread

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/album.php?albumid=5

It's an over-asked suggestion, in the wrong forum, when there's already a planet exactly like it nearly completed.

I am also excited for 0.17

but what interests me the most is that they say there will be a building with a telescope to see in to space and spot planets to go and explore

this means there could be dozens of alien worlds to explore that your would have to first find and collect data about.
Guys, guys... this should be part of the ALREADY EXISTING Official 0.17 discussion thread!
Be really awsome if your had to use the telescope to find the planets before you could go to them like in real life you have to find it before you can go for it

I think it is like that

i read it on a review website for KSP
Please use the existing 0.17 discussion thread. I'm certain the Dev team has already decided what the planets will be like, so suggestions on what they look like may not be necessary.
